attributes.action: Vehicle Number plates should allow flexibilities.
attributes.additional_details:
Recently been stopped for a plate that I have had for over 10years. Been stopped a number of times of times and have never had an issue.

The plate is absolutely readable and picked up by all ANPR. The reg is written xxxx xx instead of 
xxx xxx. There should be no issue with this at all. The DVLA law needs to be updated .
attributes.background: Should be able to display registration Plates with gaps in digits or character where suits as long as it is not altering or attempting to change the character or digits and the font and size of still readable to the eye and ANPR
